name: Hide WP Admin Bar by WP ALL SUPPORT
author: WP ALL SUPPORT

sections.description:
Allows to hide WP Admin Bar on the frontend

Hide the admin bar for all.
Hide the admin bar for specific users.
Hide admin bar for specific user roles.
Hide the admin bar for default and cusotm post type posts like pages, posts etc.

This plugin is 100% translatable.

More plugins by WP ALL SUPPORT

Hide WP Admin Bar by WP ALL SUPPORT – Hide admin bar based on user roles and conditional logic

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wpas-hide-admin-bar directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly (recommended).
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin settings from the ‘Hide Admin Bar Settings’ menu in backend.

short_description: This plugin will allow you to hide the WordPress admin toolbar from the frontend for all users and based on the user roles.
